Besides Markdown syntaxes VuePress itself adds, `vuepress-theme-hope` enables more syntax in Markdown via VuePress plugins.

<!-- more -->

## Built-in syntax

- [Built-in Markdown extension](../../cookbook/vuepress/markdown.md)
